entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Creston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:48 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Creston 08:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Temperature: 3.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 77 %
Dewpoint: -0.1°C
Wind: S 15 km/h gust 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow or rain. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow this morning and ending this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Snow over northern sections early this morning. Snow level near valley bottom. Snowfall amount 5 cm except 10 cm over northern sections. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. Temperature falling to minus 5 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
